document_data.title: Island
document_data.caption: A map of the Ship of the Gods in the Alamber Sea.
document_data.name: Ship of the Gods
document_data.source: [[Sea of Fallen Stars (sourcebook)|Sea of Fallen Stars]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ship of the Gods''' was a volcanic island on the [[Alamber Sea]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. It had no ports.
document_data.History:
Around [[957 DR]], the island was settled by [[Unther]]ans. However, an eruption killed all the population of the island.

Around [[1357 DR]], the island was used as a pirate haven. It was believed that some pirates had stolen the [[Galley of the Gods]] and hid it on the island.

An eruption in [[1369 DR]] caused part of its upper slopes to collapse, There have been unconfirmed speculative claims that there was treasure buried inside the volcano.

The island seem to have disappeared after the [[Spellplague]] of [[1385 DR]].<ref group="note">As the island is not mentioned in 4th edition related lore, neither appears in post-Spellplague official maps.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: A secret temple to [[Geb]] called the [[Golden Forge]] was located within a volcano on the island.
